description: This Asian inspired coconut & coriander baked chicken is juicy and full of flavour.
keywords: Roast chicken,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Coconut & Coriander Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 chicken thighs, bone in, skin on
2 medium limes, zest of 2, juice of 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic, ginger, 3/4 of the coriander, chilli, coconut milk, lime zest and juice, fish sauce and honey to a blender and blitz until smooth.
Place the chicken thighs in a large baking dish and pour over the sauce. Stir to coat well, cover and leave to marinate for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 180Â°C.
Roast the chicken for 40 minutes, until cooked through. Serve with extra coriander scattered on top.
